title: Red wave or red ripple? Steve Kornacki breaks down New York and Florida primary results
description: Primary season is nearing a close after Tuesday's contests in Florida and New York. Now, the big picture for the midterms environment seems to be that the GOP's hope for a red wave may at least come with a blue undertone. Steve Kornacki, NBC News national political correspondent, joins Chuck to bring his insight on the developing 2022 terrain.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
